hero.title:
Connecting Molecules, Algorithms,
and Innovation.
hero.subtitle: We are a deeptech company building at the intersection of bioinformatics, biotechnology, and molecular biology to solve humanity's greatest challenges.

sidebar.missionText: To decipher the complexity of life by connecting molecules, algorithms, and innovation for humanity's greatest challenges.

company.title:
Decoding Biology Through
Computational Intelligence
company.p1: dayhoff.solutions is a deeptech startup born from the convergence of molecular biology and data science. We don't just analyze data; we interpret the programming language of life.
company.p2: Named in honor of Margaret Dayhoff, the mother of bioinformatics, we carry forward her legacy of applying computational power to biological questions. Our team consists of PhDs, engineers, and bioinformaticians dedicated to building the infrastructure for the next era of biotechnology.

about.title:
Deciphering the
Complexity of Life
about.p1: At the intersection of biology and computation, our mission is to develop a fundamental understanding of living systems to create innovative, high-impact solutions for humanity's greatest challenges.
about.p2: We are building a foundation of knowledge and technology to catalyze the next generation of scientific discoveries.

services.title: Core Capabilities
services.subtitle: Our approach is built on a philosophy that unites the rigor of academic research with the agility of high-tech engineering.
services.pillar1_desc: We start from a place of deep curiosity and uncompromising scientific rigor. We believe the greatest innovations are born from understanding the basic principles of biology.
services.pillar2_desc: We apply the power of advanced algorithms, AI, and computational modeling to find signals in the noise, transforming biological data into actionable insights.
services.pillar3_desc: Our ultimate goal is to connect discovery with application. We build the bridge between fundamental knowledge and real-world solutions that can improve lives.

techStack.title: Technology Ecosystem
techStack.subtitle: Our platform is built upon a robust stack of technologies designed for scalability and precision.

expertise.title: Our Core Scientific Domains
expertise.subtitle: We apply our computational and biological expertise across key high-impact areas of modern life sciences.
expertise.geno_desc: Decoding the complete genetic blueprints of organisms. From assembly to annotation and variant analysis, we extract insights into function and evolution.
expertise.trans_desc: Capturing a dynamic snapshot of gene expression through RNA sequencing to understand cellular responses, disease mechanisms, and regulatory networks.
expertise.proteo_desc: Characterizing the entire set of proteins in a biological system. We identify and quantify proteins to understand cellular processes, signaling pathways, and identify biomarkers.
expertise.metabo_desc: Studying the complete set of small-molecule metabolites. This provides a direct functional readout of cellular state, crucial for understanding phenotype and disease mechanisms.
expertise.meta_desc: Analyzing the collective genetic material from environmental samples to understand microbial diversity and function. This includes comprehensive microbiome analysis to map the interplay between hosts and their microbial communities.
expertise.mito_desc: Specializing in the study of the mitochondrial genome. We analyze its unique genetics to trace evolutionary lineages, understand metabolic diseases, and investigate cellular energy production.

quote.quoteText: "It is only by the comparison of the sequences of proteins from living organisms that we can hope to unravel the detailed history of the evolution of life."
quote.author: Margaret Dayhoff

careers.title: Build the Future With Us
careers.subtitle: We are looking for passionate innovators, scientists, and engineers to help us decode the future of biology. If you thrive on complex challenges and collaborative discovery, explore our open positions.
careers.job1_desc: Develop and apply computational methods to analyze large-scale biological data. Strong background in genomics, statistics, and Python/R required.
careers.job2_desc: Architect and build scalable cloud infrastructure for our data pipelines. Expertise in AWS/GCP, Kubernetes, and Nextflow/Snakemake is essential.
careers.job3_desc: Design and execute experiments in our wet lab to validate computational findings. Experience with NGS library prep and cell culture is a plus.
careers.noFit: Don't see a role that fits? We're always looking for talent.

contact.title: Let's Build the Future of Biotechnology
contact.p1: Whether you are a researcher, investor, or innovation enthusiast, we invite you to connect. We believe collaboration is the key to turning science into real-world impact.
contact.p2: Fill out the form below or email us directly at contato@dayhoff.solutions.

contactForm.name: Name
contactForm.successText:
Thank you for reaching out.
We will get back to you shortly.

contactModal.title: Let's Talk
contactModal.subtitle: Send a message to contato@dayhoff.solutions via the form below.

policies.title: Legal Policies
policies.privacyText: Your privacy is important to us. It is dayhoff.solutions' policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website. We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a service to you, such as when you use our contact form. We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent.\nWe only retain collected information for as long as necessary to provide you with your requested service. What data we store, we’ll protect within commercially acceptable means to prevent loss and theft, as well as unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use or modification. We don’t share any personally identifying information publicly or with third-parties, except when required to by law.
policies.cookiesText: We use cookies for a variety of reasons detailed below. Unfortunately in most cases there are no industry standard options for disabling cookies without completely disabling the functionality and features they add to this site. It is recommended that you leave on all cookies if you are not sure whether you need them or not in case they are used to provide a service that you use.\nThis site uses essential cookies to ensure its proper operation and tracking cookies to understand how you interact with it. The latter will be set only after consent. You can disable cookies by adjusting the settings on your browser (see your browser Help for how to do this). Be aware that disabling cookies will affect the functionality of this and many other websites that you visit.
